metadata.title: CVE-2017-6387 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
The dex_loadcode function in libr/bin/p/bin_dex.c in radare2 1.2.1 allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read andapplication crash) via a crafted DEX file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6387` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libradare2-3.2 - 2.3.0+dfsg-2
libradare2-common - 2.3.0+dfsg-2
radare2 - 2.3.0+dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: radare2 package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.3.0+dfsg-2').
